title: Shapeshifters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/10/20
itunes:title: Shapeshifters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/10/20
description:
George Noory and author John Kachuba explore his research into shapeshifters who have the ability to change from their human forms, whether stories in the Bible could mean that Jesus was a shapeshifter, and the possibility that shape shifting aliens might exist on Earth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: A look at the mythical practice of humans who can transform into animals.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
